Miscellaneous tools and functionality us: Miscellaneous tools and functionality useful in the day-to-day operation of the bot.
Accepts a user into the community, givin: Accepts a user into the community, giving them the roles they need to access the wider server.
A collection of tools to gate a communit: A collection of tools to gate a community against bots, trolls, and other external threats.
Checks whether the bot is online and con: Checks whether the bot is online and connected to Discord correctly.
This command has not yet been implemente: This command has not yet been implemented.
Returns the prefix the bot is currently: Returns the prefix the bot is currently listening on. This can be useful as the bot also responds to mentions, not just the defined prefix.
I'll respond if you start a message with: I'll respond if you start a message with !!. You can also mention me with <@!790784202274635796>.
I'll respond if you start a message with `!!` or <@!790784202274635796>, plus a command I know about. For example, you can trigger this message with `!!prefix` or `<@!790784202274635796> prefix`.
Please mention the user whose avatar you: Please mention the user whose avatar you wish to see.

please give me a user whose avatar you'd: please give me a user whose avatar you'd like to see.
